person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The ratification of the treaty , which was signed in 1993 by the then right-centrist government , is being delayed by an ex-communist party , which won parliamentary elections in the same year and now dominates parliament .

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Person" entities in the paragraph:

| Person |
| --- |
| then right-centrist government |
| ex-communist party |
| government |
| parliament |
| parliamentary elections |
| dominates parliament |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Person" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Of course! Here are the valid "Person" entities in the paragraph:

| Person |
| --- |
| then right-centrist government |
| ex-communist party |
| government |
| parliament |

I removed the following entities that do not clearly refer to a "Person":

* "right-centrist government" (this is an adjective modifying "government")
* "parliamentary elections" (this is a phrase)
* "dominates parliament" (this is a phrase)
